name: Imaginary girl -Sequel
description:
!This game is a continuation of "Imaginary girl -Prequel-". If you have not played "Imaginary girl -Prequel-" yet, please play "Imaginary girl -Prequel-" first.
! Important: "X" key for selection and decision.


The "boy" becomes friends with the "girl" on the other side of the holograph through the screen.
At that moment, a mysterious door opens in the Valley town.


What is on the other side of the door?
And will "boy" be able to reach the southern island where "girl" lives?

important

! There are three endings available.
　All of them are bad endings.
　Come and see for yourself!
